data.name: Find GCF (Greatest Common Factor)
data.description:
Create a simple algorithm to find the [Greatest Comon Factor (GCF)](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greatest_common_divisor) between two number. Your function should accept two integers and should return an integer as GCF between inputs.

For example:

    largest_factor(50,25)
    should return 25

This was because 50 and 25 are both divisible by 25 which is the possible largest factor between the two.

    largest_factor(81,63)
    should return 9
    
    largest_factor(24,54)
    should return 6

    largest_factor(67,19)
    should return 1

Acceptable return value is greater or equal to 1, also, `num1` and `num2` should be an integer greater than 0.
